title: Grammys Mull Postponement as Omicron Spread Disrupts Rebound in Entertainment
sub_head: Movie theaters close ahead of awards season; Sundance Film Festival is a hybrid of live and virtual events
body:
The entertainment industryâ€™s comeback is getting hit by Omicron.
Institutions that put on awards ceremonies, concerts, film festivals and high-profile schmooze events are considering postponement, cancellation or going virtual as the Covid-19 variant sweeps through the U.S.
